FBAPP_EXT uint8_t restartApplication ( void   ) 

Function is called when microcontroller gets power or if the application must be restarted.

It restores data like in the parameters defined.

Returns:

FBAPP_EXT uint8_t runApplication ( struct msg *  rxmsg  ) 

Function is called if A_GroupValue_Write is received it is the function "EIS1" or "Data Type Boolean" for the relais module.

Read all parameters in that function and set global variables.

Parameters:
rxmsg 
Returns:

Function is called if A_GroupValue_Write is received it is the function "EIS1" or "Data Type Boolean" for the relais module.

The type it is the function "EIS1" or "Data Type Boolean" for the relais module. Read all parameters in that function and set global variables.

Parameters:
rxmsg 
Returns:
The return value defies if a ACK or a NACK should be sent (FB_ACK, FB_NACK)
